name: The Final Cascade
description:
Story: Humanities last hope was to put all their finate resources into one weapon, this was all or nothing and you are the pilot.

Instructions: Use [A] and [D] to move the reflector pipe and use the moues to aim it back at the other missles. you are the last line of defence to stop the missles from blowing up the earth

Gamejam: "Cascade" & "Finate Quantity"
